org.loboevolution.apache.xml.dtm.DTM

Package
Description
org.loboevolution.apache.xml.dtm
 
org.loboevolution.apache.xml.dtm.ref
 
org.loboevolution.apache.xml.dtm.ref.dom2dtm
 
org.loboevolution.apache.xpath
Implementation of XPath; for the most part, only classes meant for public use are found at this root level of the XPath packages.
org.loboevolution.apache.xpath.axes
Implementation of XPath LocationPath support -- primary classes are LocPathIterator and UnionPathIterator.
org.loboevolution.apache.xpath.patterns
Implementation of XPath nodeTest support, and XSLT pattern matching support.
